item.title: A CSS Grid Reset for Tables
item.description: Trying to style an HTML table is one of the few things that gives me flashbacks to how annoying web development used to be back in the day. There are 8 different display: table* types which all have subtly inconsistent behaviour from everything else. Want to add a border radius to a table row? Fuck you, “the behavior on internal table elements is undefined”.
